message:
This is probably the most interesting web/networking platform around - the problem is that Erlang's concepts are damn strange.

http://www.chicagoboss.org/
name: Chicago Boss: The Erlang Web Framework
caption: www.chicagoboss.org
description: APIWikiQuick StartDownload v 0.8.7 AboutBuild your next website with Erlang — the world’s most advanced networking platform.Do you pine for a simpler time when web pages loaded in under one second? Chicago Boss is the answer to slow server software: a Rails-like framework for Erlang that delivers w…
